response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be far beyond its price tag. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $8,500. This offer includes a comprehensive consultation to ensure it meets your specific needs and exceeds your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 8500}
